content: royal is a crochet pattern for a crown yarn sport weight cotton or cotton blend hook 3 5 mm other beads mod podge stiffy or other fabric stiffener the pattern is written for a 46 cm or 18 inch circumference but can be adjusted by adding/subtracting a pattern repeat 12 s or by adjusting yarn and/or hook size the crown can of course be embellished with beads to make it even more royal **errata ** april 24 2015 add a round after round 6 in pattern single_crochet 7s in the next space repeat all the way around join with sl to the first single_crochet
